text: Bangladesh is a land of amazing natural beauty
And is the eight most populous country in the world
With 163 million people
It is a beautiful small country in South Asia
Bordering with India and Myanmar.
Unlike its neighbors
Bangladesh does not receive large numbers of tourists.
That makes it a quieter
And more relaxed destination
At least in its green areas
And on its beaches that you will never forget.
This is a land of forest
Lakes, rivers, mountains, waterfalls
And religious buildings.
You will find fun for all kinds of tourists
And interests when visiting Bangladesh.
Stay with us
And discover the best places to visit
In Bangladesh.
But before we get started
Subscribe to our channel and turn on notifications
So you can keep up to date with all our latest destinations
No.1 Dhaka
This chaotic and overcrowded city
Is the capital of Bangladesh.
Dhaka has been a political center for centuries
So it preserves many historic buildings.
Here you can visit many palaces , mosques
And other monuments.
In this city
You should visit Dhakeshwari Mandir
An important Hindu temple from the 12th century.
If you are in the capital of Bangladesh
You should kill two birds in a row
And visit the city of Savar
Here you can visit the National Martyr's Monument
This building commemorates the struggle
For the independence of the country.
When you walk around the city of Dhaka
Another unmissable spot is The Ahsan Manzil
This temple is one of the most
Emblematic structures of the country
As it was the official residence of the ruling family
During the period of British dominion.
If you like plants
Then the National Botanical Garde
Is the place for you.
It is the largest plant conservation center in Bangladesh
Which is also a must visit place during your visit to Dhaka.
The Lalbagh Fort
Is a complex of Mughal buildings that were built in 1678.
It is one of the main historical monuments
Of the city of Dhaka.
Here you can visit the mosque
The tomb of Bibi Pari, the Diwan-i-Aam
And other minor structures.
Be sure to include this place
In your tours of the capital of Bangladesh
Enjoy the iconic architecture of this country.
No:2 Chittagong
Chittagong is the second-largest city in Bangladesh
And the main seaport of the country.
This place has become famous for ship breaking.
However, there are other positive things
And beautiful places to highlight about this city.
One of these places is Foy's Lake
And the amusement park it houses.
You can also take a walk
And enjoy the sunset at one of its beautiful beaches.
If you interested in getting to know the architecture
and culture of the city ?
Then you should visit Chandanpura Masjid
This impressive mosque
Is one of the architectural gems of the city.
If you want to learn a bit about the city and the country
You should visit two places
The Ethnological Museum and the Zia  Memorial Museum
Will give you a rich overview of Bangladesh's past.
No.3 Cox's Bazar
The third Bangladeshi city you must visit is Cox's Bazar.
This fishing port
Is one of the most visited places in the country.
Its main attractions are on the coast
But not all of them.
When visiting Cox's Bazaar
You should explore Himchari National Park
And the Monastery that decorates this
Two emblematic places you can’t overlook!
What makes this location so famous?
Well, its coastline is the answer.
Here you can visit
And enjoy the longest natural beach in the world.
We are talking about Cox's Bazar Beach.
The best sandy beach in Bangladesh.
But there’s also another beach
The Laboni Beach will bring as much peace
And joy as any other beach!
No.4 St. Martin's Island
This small coral island is located about nine kilometers
Off the southern tip of Cox's Bazar
In the northeastern part of the Bay of Bengal.
San Martin Island is ideal for enjoying nature.
Here you can observe migratory birds, turtles
And lizards.
However, the main attractions are underwater
That is why you should do some scuba diving
When you visit this beautiful place!
We recommend taking a boat tour
Around the island in the late afternoon.
Prepare your camera because here
The sunsets are remarkable.
No.5 Chittagong Hill Tracks
Hills are always enchanting to the tourist
And as a tourist
You should obviously visit Chittagong Hill Tracks once
Which is the home of many tribal refugees
And as you can discover yourself
It’s one of the least developed pars of Bangladesh
Chittagong Hill Tracks
Is the best place for making an adventurous tour
And for this you have to take permission
Since it’s one of the most heavily militarized regions in the world
No.6 Patenga Beach
Now we go to the waters of the Bay of Bengal.
If you travel 14 kilometers south of the city of Chittagong
You can find Patenga Beach.
This is one of the favorite places for tourists
Visiting Bangladesh.
It is not recommended to swim on this beach.
However this place is perfect for a stroll
And then dinner at a restaurant at nightfall.
No.7 Sixty Dome Mosque
On this trip through Bangladesh
You will see many mosques
But none like this one.
Your visit to the country would not be complete
Without a photo of this stunning place.
The Sixty Pillars Mosque
Built in the 15th century
Is the largest in Bangladesh.
This World Heritage Site
Is one of the most impressive Muslim architectural works
In this region.
No.8 Sundarbans Mangrove Forest
Between the state of West Bengal
And Bangladesh lies the largest mangrove forest in the world.
The Sundarbans is one of the largest Bengal Tiger reserves.
This is one of the main reasons to visit this place.
Sundarbans Mangrove Forest
Has an area of 1330.10 square kilometers.
It is home to a great diversity of wildlife
Plants, and flowers.
However, this big cat is the most sought after by tourists.
Do you want to meet the Bengal tiger?
The Wildlife Sanctuary in this city
Is the best place to see these animals in their original habitat.
Be sure to ask around and stop by this impressive reserve!
No.9 Sajek Valley
Mountains can also be a fun place.
In the Sajek Valley, you will hear   no human noise
But the singing of birds and water flowing.
That is why it is a destination chosen by many couples
To spend their honeymoon.
Clouds cover you and move all over the place.
You can see them as they drift over the mountains
Through the forests
And along the hilly grassland trails all around.
And don’t forget the sunsets
A view you’ll remember forever!
No.10 Somapura Mahavihara
Do you want to know about another UNESCO World Heritage Site?
The Somapura Mahavihara is your destination
It’s a Buddhist monastery
That was built in the eighth century.
This archeological complex has several cells
Stupas, temples and other structures.
The outer walls are decorated with ornamental plaques
And terracotta sculptures.
No.11 Srimagal
The Capital of tea in Bangladesh is Srimagal
Which is situated in the north-eastern part of the country
Where you will find lush greenery fields all around.
It is one of the best places in Bangladesh
Where you can really have the place quiet
And calm environment
And there are also two other places to
Lawachhara National Park & Hamham Waterfalls.
No.12 Bisanakandi
Undoubtedly it is a great sign of natural beauty
Surrounded by hills and stones.
For its natural beauty
It has become a popular tourist center in Bangladesh.
It is situated at the Bangladesh-Sylhet border in Sylhet.
In the rainy season it looks like the clouds hugging the mountains
So, winter is not a suitable season for visiting.
Bangladesh the land of the Bengals
Is a country filled with lush greenery
Many waterways and amazing natural beauty
If you enjoyed this video
Be sure to give it a like and click subscribe
Thanks for watching.
